__e: Oh, Jackie, you just think that marriage is sacred because it's legally denied you
What is it that you want me to do?
She has a heart, but she denies it.
For example, what my wife can't satisfy and I like very much...
You know, she refuses to give me children... on the grounds that she has children already.
No, the problem... is that you are always denying yourself who you really are.
But we don't have a murder weapon, and she denies she was there.
Fine, but do you deny that part of the reason you wanted to come back here by yourself is that guy?
Do you deny he was working for you... the man who killed most of your family and mine?
And you deny that you were even close to the scene or- how- how do you-
First he denies having sex with her, now he wants to be father of the year?
So, you don't deny building the weapon?
If after twenty years you deny me a visa... it means I haven't changed".
And if such is the case, do you deny me the right for the first time in my life to be human?
And I feel terrible that one of our Fresh Start pilot cases appears to be responsible, but that doesn't negate the good that this program can do.
